mapper.select: select log_id, log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, in_time, log_describe from sys_logs where log_id = #{logId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, in_time, log_describe) values (#{logName}, #{logModule}, #{logInfo}, #{logLevel}, #{inTime}, #{logDescribe})

insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, in_time, log_describe) values
(#{entity.logName}, #{entity.logModule}, #{entity.logInfo}, #{entity.logLevel}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.logDescribe})

insert into sys_logs(log_name, log_module, log_info, log_level, in_time, log_describe) values
(#{entity.logName}, #{entity.logModule}, #{entity.logInfo}, #{entity.logLevel}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.logDescribe})
on duplicate key update log_name = values(log_name), log_module = values(log_module), log_info = values(log_info), log_level = values(log_level), in_time = values(in_time), log_describe = values(log_describe)
mapper.update:
update sys_logs
log_name = #{logName},
log_module = #{logModule},
log_info = #{logInfo},
log_level = #{logLevel},
in_time = #{inTime},
log_describe = #{logDescribe},
where log_id = #{logId}
